Reason: The configuration option 'commitlog_sync' is performance-sensitive. The reason for this classification is that the 'commitlog_sync' configuration directly determines the type of CommitLogService to use, which can have a significant impact on system performance. Depending on the chosen sync type (periodic, batch, group), different CommitLogService implementations are used, each with its own performance characteristics. This configuration directly affects the execution time and memory consumption of the system at the system level, making it performance-sensitive.
